title: DARK HUNTER TALON SKIN! - League of Legends (Fan)

embed.description: All the credit goes to the creator of the skin, in the following link!

replies.body:
Legit, id add a slight curve to talons Q and R blades, and I guarantee you id buy the hell out of this skin if it makes it to the store. 
And If that does happen, I hope the original creator gets a good chunk of the income. 

(Though, to be fair, I freakin love Talon and want ALL his skins)
Like Riot would do something like that LUL

One can only dream though :( 
I do want that skin though still.
